welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Felida! We are thrilled to have you here in our charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly locals, and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Felida has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights operated by Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves a mix of domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is used for domestic flights operated by United Airlines and United Express.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D serves a mix of domestic and international flights operated by various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Troutdale Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional and commuter flights.
